Gigatron: Yes it is.  Thank you Vulois.
::He transforms into Gigajet and flies back to the Keepers.  He opens up a 
com::
Gigatron: Defection, Vulois made a deal with me.  I he will tell me when they 
go into the Alliance base.  Dont worry about Child, he has other bodyguards 
and is in good hands.
